title: Isolate the Radical Terms
text: Isolate the radical on one side of the equation. Since the given equation already have radical isolated on one side, we can proceed to the next step.

title: Raise Both Sides Of the Equation To The Power Of The Index
text: $${\sqrt{5x-6}}^2=8^2$$ After squaring both sides, we get $$5x-6=64$$.

title: Check For Remaining Radical Terms
text: Are there any more radicals? No. We can proceed to the next step.

title: Solve For Equation
text: What is the value of x for $$5x-6=64$$?
